articles.title: 'If you have no badge, why are you asking me to do something?': Woman at MBS who refused to wear a mask being investigated - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - A woman who refused to wear a mask at Marina Bay Sands is being investigated by the police. In a statement on Saturday evening (May 15), the police said the 53-year-old woman had allegedly not worn a mask despite numerous requests from a safe dist…
articles.content:

articles.title: What Asia’s scramble for mRNA production facilities means for the future - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Australia, South Korea and Singapore are now racing to establish facilities to manufacture the hi-tech jabs. But will it be enough to stop the next pandemic?
